lead_paragraph: Briton Chris Froome stunned his passive rivals to snatch the overall leader's yellow jersey in the Tour de France when he won the eighth stage with a lightning attack on the final descent on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Inventive Froome Takes Charge After Stunning Attack
headline.main: Inventive Froome Takes Charge After Stunning Attack

snippet: Briton Chris Froome stunned his passive rivals to snatch the overall leader's yellow jersey in the Tour de France when he won the eighth stage with a lightning attack on the final descent on Saturday....
